title: Business Analyst – Strategy & Growth
description:
Job Opportunity: Business Analyst – Reporting to Founder & Managing Director

Radical Minds Technologies Pvt. Ltd. (www.radicalminds.in)

RMT Engineering Pvt. Ltd. (www.rmtengg.com)




About the Organizations:




• Radical Minds Technologies Pvt. Ltd. is a leading BPO and customer experience service provider, delivering tailored solutions across diverse industries which includes but not limited to Travel & Hospitality, Logistics, Food Aggregators, BFSI, Retail, Crypto, Healthcare, Govt. & PSU etc..

• RMT Engineering Pvt. Ltd. is an IT company specializing in AI/ML based product development, IT projects, and IT services for Domestic & International clients, with a focus on driving innovation and delivering high-impact solutions.




We are seeking a Business Analyst who will work closely with and report directly to Founder and Managing Director, to contribute to the strategic growth and operational excellence of both organizations.




Job Title: Business Analyst – Strategy & Growth




Key Responsibilities:




1. Strategic Support:

• Work directly with the Founder & Managing Director to analyze and implement key business strategies.

• Provide insights and recommendations to support high-level decision-making and business growth initiatives.

2. Data-Driven Analysis:

• Conduct detailed market research to identify opportunities, trends, and challenges across various sectors.

• Analyze business performance data to identify gaps and propose actionable improvements.

3. Client Acquisition & Growth Planning:

• Assist in identifying potential clients and markets for business expansion.

• Develop strategic plans to improve brand visibility, client satisfaction, and operational efficiency.

4. Operational Excellence:

• Benchmark the organization’s processes and performance against industry standards.

• Propose strategies to improve governance, team efficiency, and customer experience.

5. Project Collaboration:

• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to support the execution of strategic projects.

• Prepare detailed reports and presentations for leadership, ensuring actionable outcomes.







Desired Skills and Qualifications:




• Proven Expertise: Experience in market research & analysis, business strategy, and operational improvements.

• Analytical Skills: Strong ability to collect, analyze, and interpret complex data into actionable insights.

• Communication: Excellent written and verbal communication skills, including presentation capabilities.

• Relationship Building: Ability to interact with CXOs, senior stakeholders, clients, and teams effectively.

• Educational Background: Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field (MBA preferred).

• Mandatory Technical Proficiency: Advanced knowledge of Excel, PowerPoint, and business intelligence tools.




Why This Role?




• Direct Mentorship: Work directly with the Founder and Managing Director, gaining hands-on exposure to business strategy at the highest level.

• High-Impact Work: Be involved in critical projects that shape the future of the organizations.

• Dynamic Environment: Join a collaborative team that encourages innovation and professional growth.




📩 To Apply: Send your resume and a brief introduction to info@radicalminds.in 




Join us and play a pivotal role in driving the growth of two dynamic organizations!
